info.name: Saddleback Church API
info.description: Official API for the Saddleback Church website. This API provides access to church locations, events, messages, and user management features.

request.description: Authenticates a user with username and password and returns a JWT token. This token is required for all protected endpoints.

response.name: Authentication successful
Authentication failed

query.description: Number of users to return per page
Search term to filter users by name or email

request.description: Returns a paginated list of all users. Restricted to admin users.

response.name: List of users

request.description: Creates a new user account with the provided details.

response.name: User created
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "username": "johndoe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "name": "John Doe",
  "created_at": "2025-04-17T12:00:00Z"
}

request.description: Returns detailed information about a specific user.

response.name: User details
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "username": "johndoe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "name": "John Doe",
  "created_at": "2025-04-17T12:00:00Z",
  "registered_events_count": 2,
  "last_login": "2025-04-18T09:30:00Z"
}

request.description: Updates user information such as email, name, or password.

response.name: User updated
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "username": "johndoe",
  "email": "john.doe@example.com",
  "name": "John D. Doe",
  "created_at": "2025-04-17T12:00:00Z",
  "updated_at": "2025-04-18T12:00:00Z"
}

query.description: Number of locations to return per page

request.description: Returns a list of all church locations with their details.

response.name: List of locations
response.body:
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "slug": "lake-forest",
    "name": "Lake Forest",
    "address": "1 Saddleback Parkway, Lake Forest, CA 92630",
    "services": "Saturday: 4:00PM, 6:00PM\nSunday: 9:00AM, 11:00AM",

    "latitude": "33.647785",
    "longitude": "-117.689064",
    "region": "Orange County"
  },
  {
    "id": 2,
    "slug": "anaheim",
    "name": "Anaheim",
    "address": "131 E Katella Ave, Anaheim, CA 92802",
    "services": "Sunday: 9:00AM, 11:00AM",

    "image": "/assets/anaheim.jpg",
    "latitude": "33.803219",
    "longitude": "-117.911433",
    "region": "Orange County"
  }
]

request.description: Returns detailed information about a specific location.

response.name: Location details
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "slug": "lake-forest",
  "name": "Lake Forest",
  "address": "1 Saddleback Parkway, Lake Forest, CA 92630",
  "services": "Saturday: 4:00PM, 6:00PM\nSunday: 9:00AM, 11:00AM",
  "description": "Our Lake Forest campus is where it all began. Join us for worship and community.",
  "image": "/assets/lake-forest.jpg",
  "latitude": "33.647785",
  "longitude": "-117.689064",
  "region": "Orange County",
  "upcoming_events": [

      "id": 1,
      "title": "Worship Night",
      "date": "May 15, 2025",
      "time": "7:00 PM"

}

request.description: Updates information about a specific location.

response.name: Location updated
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "slug": "lake-forest",
  "name": "Lake Forest",
  "address": "1 Saddleback Parkway, Lake Forest, CA 92630",
  "services": "Saturday: 4:00PM, 6:00PM\nSunday: 9:00AM, 11:00AM, 1:00PM",
  "description": "Our Lake Forest campus is where it all began. Join us for worship and community in our newly renovated space.",
  "image": "/assets/lake-forest.jpg",
  "latitude": "33.647785",
  "longitude": "-117.689064",
  "region": "Orange County"
}

query.description: Number of messages to return per page

request.description: Returns a list of all messages/sermons with optional filtering.

response.name: List of messages
response.body:
[
  {
    "id": 2,
    "slug": "faithful-living",
    "title": "Faith in Action: Faithful Living",
    "speaker": "Andy Wood",
    "date": "April 19, 2025",
    "image": "/assets/faithful-living.jpg",
    "video_url": "https://youtu.be/example2",
    "description": "Learning how to put our faith into practice in everyday life."
  },
  {
    "id": 1,
    "slug": "easter-message",
    "title": "Hope Rising: Easter Message",
    "speaker": "Rick Warren",
    "date": "April 12, 2025",
    "image": "/assets/easter-message.jpg",
    "video_url": "https://youtu.be/example1",
    "description": "A powerful Easter message about the hope we have in Christ."
  }
]

response.name: Latest message

query.description: Filter by location name or ID
Number of events to return per page

request.description: Returns a list of all events with optional filtering.

response.name: List of events
response.body:
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "slug": "worship-night",
    "title": "Worship Night",

    "registration_url": "https://register.example.com/worship-night",
    "created_at": "2025-04-18T14:13:15.495Z"
  }
]

request.description: Updates information about a specific event.

response.name: Event updated
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,

  "title": "Worship Night Celebration",

  "event_id": 1,
  "first_name": "John",
  "last_name": "Doe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "phone": "555-123-4567",
  "number_of_guests": 2,
  "special_requests": "Need accessible seating"
}

request.description: Registers a user for a specific event.

response.name: Registration successful

body.raw:
{
  "event_id": 1,
  "first_name": "John",
  "last_name": "Doe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "phone": "555-123-4567",
  "number_of_guests": 2,
  "special_requests": "Need accessible seating"
}

response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "event_id": 1,
  "user_id": 1,
  "registered_at": "2025-04-18T14:13:31.880Z",
  "attended": false,
  "number_of_guests": 2,
  "special_requests": "Need accessible seating",
  "event": {
    "title": "Worship Night",
    "date": "May 15, 2025",
    "time": "7:00 PM",
    "location": "Lake Forest Campus"
  }
}

query.description: Number of registrations to return per page

request.description: Returns a list of all event registrations with optional filtering.

response.name: List of registrations

request.description: Returns a list of all registrations for a specific event.

response.name: List of registrations for event

item.name: Utilities

request.description: Subscribes an email to the newsletter with optional interests.

response.name: Subscription successful

body.raw:
{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "phone": "555-123-4567",
  "subject": "Question about worship services",
  "message": "I'm new to the area and would like to know more about your worship services. What should I expect when I visit?",
  "department": "General Inquiries"
}

request.description: Sends a contact form message to the church.

response.name: Contact form submitted successfully

body.raw:
{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "phone": "555-123-4567",
  "subject": "Question about worship services",
  "message": "I'm new to the area and would like to know more about your worship services. What should I expect when I visit?",
  "department": "General Inquiries"
}

item.description: Utility endpoints like newsletter subscription and contact form
